entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 3:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -8.7°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
